# Unicode.GeneralCategory.dashPunctuation

**Case**

A dash or hyphen punctuation mark.

## Declaration

```swift
case dashPunctuation
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Dash_Punctuation` (abbreviated `Pd`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.dashPunctuation
